title: Ceiling fans in dining room, Resident social lounge, Onsite playground
posting_body: ['South of Las Vegas, in picturesque Henderson, The Bristol at Sunset is everything you could ever want in an apartment community.', 'With proximity to everything from the nature preserves to the excitement, shopping, and entertainment of nearby casinos – when you live here, your most difficult decision will be how to spend your weekends.', '-Relaxing resort-style pool with sundeck and spa                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity', '-In-home washer and dryer                                                                                        Featured amenity', '-Separate dining area', '-Complimentary Wi-Fi in common areas', '-Oversized walk-in closets', '-Polished kitchen countertops', '-Onsite playground', '-Private balcony or patio                                                                                        Featured amenity', '-Air conditioning with programmable thermostat                                                                                        Featured amenity', '-Professional onsite management', '-Controlled-entry access', '-Package locker with 24/7 access to packages', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Prices Change Daily', 'Flexible Lease Terms']
